Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.directory.AccountStore

  • Packages that use AccountStore 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.application  
    com.stormpath.sdk.authc  
    com.stormpath.sdk.directory  
    com.stormpath.sdk.group  

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStore AccountStoreMapping.getAccountStore()
      Returns this mapping's AccountStore (either a Group or Directory), to be assigned to the application.
      AccountStore Application.getDefaultAccountStore()
      Returns the AccountStore (either a Group or a Directory) used to persist new accounts created by the Application, or null if no accountStore has been designated.
      AccountStore Application.getDefaultGroupStore()
      Returns the AccountStore used to persist new groups created by the Application, or null if no accountStore has been designated.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application with parameters of type AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStoreMapping Application.addAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Creates a new AccountStoreMapping for this Application and appends that AccountStoreMapping to the end of the Application's AccountStoreMapping list, allowing the associated accountStore to be used as a source of accounts that may login to the Application.
      AccountStoreMapping AccountStoreMapping.setAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Sets this mapping's AccountStore (either a Group or Directory), to be assigned to the application.
      void Application.setDefaultAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Sets the AccountStore (either a Group or a Directory) used to persist new accounts created by the Application.
      void Application.setDefaultGroupStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Sets the AccountStore (a Directory) that will be used to persist new groups created by the Application.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.authc

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.authc that return AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStore UsernamePasswordRequest.getAccountStore()
      Returns a specific AccountStore that should process this authentication request, or null if the application's default account store authentication flow should execute.
      AccountStore AuthenticationRequest.getAccountStore()
      Returns a specific AccountStore that should process this authentication request, or null if the application's default account store authentication flow should execute.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.authc with parameters of type AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void UsernamePasswordRequest.setAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Sets a specific AccountStore that should process this authentication request, or null if the application's default account store authentication flow should execute.
      Constructors in com.stormpath.sdk.authc with parameters of type AccountStore 
      Constructor and Description
      UsernamePasswordRequest(String usernameOrEmail, char[] password, AccountStore accountStore)
      Constructs a new UsernamePasswordRequest with the specified username (or email) and password, ensuring the authentication request will be directly targeted at the application's specified AccountStore (thereby bypassing the application's default account store authentication flow).
      UsernamePasswordRequest(String usernameOrEmail, char[] password, String host, AccountStore accountStore)
      Constructs a new UsernamePasswordRequest with the specified usernameOrEmail and password for an end-user accessing the application from the specified host, also ensuring the authentication request will be directly targeted at the application's specified AccountStore (thereby bypassing the application's default account store authentication flow).
      UsernamePasswordRequest(String usernameOrEmail, String password, AccountStore accountStore)
      Constructs a new UsernamePasswordRequest with the specified username (or email) and password, ensuring the authentication request will be directly targeted at the application's specified AccountStore (thereby bypassing the application's default account store authentication flow).
      UsernamePasswordRequest(String usernameOrEmail, String password, String host, AccountStore accountStore)
      Constructs a new UsernamePasswordRequest with the specified usernameOrEmail and password for an end-user accessing the application from the specified host, also ensuring the authentication request will be directly targeted at the application's specified AccountStore (thereby bypassing the application's default account store authentication flow).

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.directory

      Subinterfaces of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.directory 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Directory
      A Directory is a top-level container of Accounts and Groups.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.group

      Subinterfaces of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.group 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Group
      A group is a uniquely-named collection of Accounts within a Directory.
